overview: There are plenty of iconic train journeys to be enjoyed – a trip on the Orient Express to Istanbul or the Trans-Siberian railway across Russia – but nothing can compare to this spunk-laden adventure. Dick Casey, Yuri Adamov, Sam Williams and Benjamin Dunn are just some of the hyper-horny passengers who are all on a one-way ticket to cock heaven, as raw twink ass after raw twink ass arrive at dick central! So tickets please, gentlemen – and prepare for the ride of your lives!
title: Tickets Please!
